name: Santa Shooter - A Christmas Themed FPS
name_original: Santa Shooter - A Christmas Themed FPS
description:
Santa shooter is an FPS for the festive season. You must catch and kill Santa as he is running away. However, it is not as easy as it sounds; Santa has sent his minions to attack you!

Features:

  • A large, scenic map set in a forest in winter
  • Fast-paced
  •  First-person
  • Just the right balance between challenging and easy
  • Fairly short, yet replayable
  • Realistic Santa and minion models
  • It's FREE
